DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic when you pick an Adepta Sororitas model from your kill team to shoot with a storm bolter. Change the Armour Penetration characteristic of that model's storm bolter to -2 and the Damage characteristic to 2, until the end of the battle round
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic when you pick an Adepta Sororitas model from your kill team to shoot with a storm bolter. Change the Armour Penetration characteristic of that model's storm bolter to -2 and the Damage characteristic to 2, until the end of the battle round
DescriptionDe: Setze diese Taktik ein, wenn du ein ADEPTA-SORORITAS-Modell deines Kill Teams wählst, um mit einem Sturmbolter zu schießen. Ändere bis zum Ende der Schlachtrunde den Durchschlagswert des Sturmbolters dieses Modells auf -2 und den Schadenswert auf 2.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic when you pick a Sister Repentia to attack in the Fight phase. Change the Damage Characteristic of that model's penitent eviscerator to 3, until the end of the phase.
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic when you pick a Sister Repentia to attack in the Fight phase. Change the Damage Characteristic of that model's penitent eviscerator to 3, until the end of the phase.
DescriptionDe: Setze diese Taktik ein, wenn du eine SISTER REPENTIA wählst, um in der Nahkampfphase zu attackieren. Ändere bis zum Ende der Phase den Schadenswert des Büßer-Eviscerators dieses Modells auf 3.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic when you pick an Arco-Flagellant model from your kill team to make attacks in the Fight phase. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this model for each enemy model within 1" of it when it is selected to Fight, until the end of the phase.
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic when you pick an Arco-Flagellant model from your kill team to make attacks in the Fight phase. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this model for each enemy model within 1" of it when it is selected to Fight, until the end of the phase.
DescriptionDe: Setze diese Taktik ein, wenn du ein ARCO-FLAGELLANT-Modell deines Kill Teams wählst, um in der Nahkampfphase zu attackieren. Addiere bis zum Ende der Phase für jedes feindliche Modell, das sich innerhalb von 1 Zoll um dieses Modell befindet, wenn es zum Kämpfen gewählt wird, 1 zum Attackenwert dieses Modells.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic when you pick an Adepta Sororitas model from your kill team to shoot with a flamer. You can re-roll the dice to determine the number of attacks made by this model's flamer, until the end of the phase.
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic when you pick an Adepta Sororitas model from your kill team to shoot with a flamer. You can re-roll the dice to determine the number of attacks made by this model's flamer, until the end of the phase.
DescriptionDe: Setze diese Taktik ein, wenn du ein ADEPTA-SORORITAS-Modell deines Kill Teams wählst, um mit einem Flammenwerfer zu schießen. Bis zum Ende der Phase kannst du die Würfe, die die Anzahl der Attacken für den Flammenwerfer dieses Modells bestimmen, wiederholen.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic at the start of the Shooting phase if your kill team includes a Canoness. That model gains the following aura ability until the end of the battle round: As long as this model is not shaken, you can reroll hit rolls of 1 for friendly models within 6" of this model.
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic at the start of the Shooting phase if your kill team includes a Canoness. That model gains the following aura ability until the end of the battle round: As long as this model is not shaken, you can reroll hit rolls of 1 for friendly models within 6" of this model.
DescriptionDe: Setze diese Taktik zu Beginn der Fernkampfphase ein, wenn dein Kill Team eine CANONESS enthält. Dieses Modell erhält bis zum Ende der Schlachtrunde folgende Aurafähigkeit: Solange dieses Modell nicht erschüttert ist, kannst du Trefferwürfe von 1 für befreundete Modelle innerhalb von 6 Zoll um dieses Modell wiederholen.

DescriptionEn: Use this Tactic at the start of the Shooting phase if your kill team includes a REPENTIA SUPERIOR. That model gains the following aura ability until the end of the battle round: As long as this model is not shaken, you can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly SISTER REPENTIA models that are within 6" of this model.
DescriptionFr: Use this Tactic at the start of the Shooting phase if your kill team includes a REPENTIA SUPERIOR. That model gains the following aura ability until the end of the battle round: As long as this model is not shaken, you can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly SISTER REPENTIA models that are within 6" of this model.
DescriptionDe: Setze diese Taktik zu Beginn der Fernkampfphase ein, wenn dein Kill Team eine REPENTIA SUPERIOR enthält. Dieses Modell enthält bis zum Ende der Schlachtrunde die folgende Aurafähigkeit: Solange dieses Modell nicht erschüttert ist, kannst du Verwundungswürfe von 1 für Attacken mit Nahkampfwaffen befreundeter SISTER-REPENTIA-Modelle, die sich innerhalb von 6 Zoll um dieses Modell befinden, wiederholen.
